name: Lego Effect: New Figma Guide
description:
🔥 A long-awaited, brand-new FIGMA GUIDE! 🔥


Let's make some noise together 😉 Redesign your user pic or any image you want in Lego-style and make a rebound or send us a result in any social network you like. We are interested to see what you will get.

Like what you see? Spread your love. Support us with Like 💖.

We can also be friends on Dribbble or Instagram, oooor Behance. Why "or" let's be triple friends! 😁
